definition: to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: But in the face of homosexuality wooer, female showed remarkably higher percentage of rejection than male.
sentences.chinese: 但对同性恋的求爱，女生拒绝的比例明显高于男生。

sentences.english: Not obtrusive, go up pertly courtship, you can refuse for certain.
sentences.chinese: 不要莽撞，冒冒失失上去求爱，你肯定会遭拒绝。

sentences.english: 'I haven't offended you often by love-making?
sentences.chinese: 我向你求爱，并没有常常故意惹你生气啊？

sentences.english: He showed his remarkable endurance throughout the courtship.
sentences.chinese: 他在求爱期间展现了非凡的忍耐力。

sentences.english: He is one of the courtiers to this girl.
sentences.chinese: 他是这个女孩的求爱者之一。

sentences.english: The young man courted the young lady by bring her flowers every day.
sentences.chinese: 那青年通过每天给那女子送花而向她求爱。

sentences.english: Just one whiff flips the switch on courtship-initiating brain pathways.
sentences.chinese: 在大脑中求爱的欲望就如同吹起的翻转风车。

sentences.english: Emperor Qianlong visited the Pomegranate Garden, paying court to Pomegranate Blossom Fairy.
sentences.chinese: 乾隆微服私访石榴园，向榴花仙女求爱。

sentences.english: This had been the signal in old times when Wildeve had used to come secretly wooing to her.
sentences.chinese: 这本是韦狄从前秘密向她求爱的时候用的暗号。

sentences.english: It was, in a sense, a second courtship.
sentences.chinese: 从某种意义上说，这是一次二度求爱期。

sentences.english: I don’t often write love letters to gadgets.
sentences.chinese: 我不常给那些小玩意儿写求爱信。

sentences.english: When it comes to courtship, females do favor flashier males.
sentences.chinese: 当谈到求爱，女性更青睐华丽的男性。

sentences.english: Do you know why she refused my love?
sentences.chinese: 你知道她为什么拒绝我的求爱吗？

sentences.english: Repeated doses of booze led male flies to start courting other males.
sentences.chinese: 重复摄入酒精导致雄性果蝇开始向其他同行“求爱”。

sentences.english: Weapons needed to woo the professors.
sentences.chinese: 这些都是用来向教授求爱的武器啊。

definition: to announce publicly/to explain oneself/to reveal one's feelings/to confess/to declare one's love
to throw oneself in sb's arms/to throw oneself at sb
to hit on someone/to strike up a conversation/to start talking to end an awkward silence or embarrassing situation
to reject sb after being deeply touched by them (Internet slang)
to explain oneself/to express/to reveal one's thoughts or feelings/declaration/confession
to be particularly attentive to (an attractive young lady or man etc)/to fawn upon (an influential politician etc)/to court sb's favor/to ingratiate oneself
to give one's heart to/to devote one's life to
to provoke/to entice/to lure/to tantalize/to tease/to titillate
to be secretly in love with
